description: The changes, which will also see MLCs take a pay cut, were originally proposed in an independent report.
title: Isle of Man MHKs to get rise as Tynwald pay changes approved
title_page: Isle of Man MHKs to get rise as Tynwald pay changes approved - BBC News
maintext: The shake-up will also remove a 30-40% uplift for departmental memberships and expenses will become part of basic pay, making it taxable, but remain non-pensionable, meaning MHKs will not be better off overall under the new arrangements.
